Presently \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* following behind \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tomb|strong="G3419"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w looked|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w linen|strong="G3608"\w* \w wrappings|strong="G3608"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*,

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w reached|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tomb|strong="G3419"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w went|strong="G2064"\w* inside \w too|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w himself|strong="G1519"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* convinced.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w did|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3764"\w* \w then|strong="G1063"\w* \w understand|strong="G1492"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* passage \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* says \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1492"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w rise|strong="G1163"\w* \w again|strong="G1537"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w Meanwhile|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* close \w outside|strong="G1854"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w tomb|strong="G3419"\w*, \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w*. \w Still|strong="G2476"\w* \w weeping|strong="G2799"\w*, \w she|strong="G1161"\w* leant \w forward|strong="G1519"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w tomb|strong="G3419"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* perceived \w two|strong="G1417"\w* angels clothed \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2516"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w other|strong="G1520"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w After|strong="G3694"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w she|strong="G2532"\w* \w turned|strong="G4762"\w* \w round|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w looked|strong="G1492"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w she|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\wj ‘\+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w weeping|strong="G2799"\+w*? \+w Whom|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w seeking|strong="G2212"\+w*?’\wj* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*. \w Supposing|strong="G1380"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gardener|strong="G2780"\w*, Mary \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* carried \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w away|strong="G5087"\w*, \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2962"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w take|strong="G5087"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w away|strong="G5087"\w* \w myself|strong="G1473"\w*.’

\wj ‘\+w Mary|strong="G3137"\+w*!’\wj* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*. \w She|strong="G3739"\w* \w turned|strong="G4762"\w* round, \w and|strong="G2424"\w* \w exclaimed|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G3004"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w*, ‘\w Rabboni|strong="G4462"\w*!’ (\w or|strong="G3739"\w*, \w as|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w should|strong="G3004"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w teacher|strong="G1320"\w*”).

\wj ‘\+w Do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* hold \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*,’\wj* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ascended|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*. \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1473"\+w* brothers, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1473"\+w* ascending \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w their|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w my|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w their|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.’\wj*

\w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Magdala \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w she|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Master|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G3708"\w*.

\w after|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w showed|strong="G1166"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G3708"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G3708"\w* \w side|strong="G4125"\w*. \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* filled \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w joy|strong="G5463"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Master|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w After|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w breathed|strong="G1720"\w* \w on|strong="G4151"\w* \w them|strong="G3004"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w Receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Holy|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*;\wj*

\wj if \+w you|strong="G5100"\+w* remit \+w anyone|strong="G5100"\+w*’s sins, \+w they|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w have|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w been|strong="G5100"\+w* remitted; \+w and|strong="G3588"\+w*, if \+w you|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w retain|strong="G2902"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w they|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w have|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w been|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w retained|strong="G2902"\+w*.’\wj*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w Twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w called|strong="G3004"\w* “\w The|strong="G1537"\w* Twin,” \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*;

\w so|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* rest \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w We|strong="G1437"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Master|strong="G2962"\w*!’ ‘\w Unless|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* marks \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w nails|strong="G2247"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*,’ \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w exclaimed|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* \w finger|strong="G1147"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* marks, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w side|strong="G4125"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.’

\w A|strong="G2532"\w* week \w later|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* house, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w doors|strong="G2374"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w shut|strong="G2808"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w Peace|strong="G1515"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*.’\wj*
